name: PHILADELPHIA SHIPYARD DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Monitor legislation affecting the Jones Act, in particular proposals to exempt Puerto Rico from the Jones Act S. 1894. Monitor Federal Budget proposals for any issues that may relate to shipbuilding.
Monitor legislation funding Coast Guard funding and legislation affecting the Jones Act.
Monitor legislation funding Coast Guard Reauthorization, funding and legislation affecting the Jones Act. Monitor FY19 Homeland Security appropriations (HR 6776 and S.3109)
Monitor legislation affecting the Jones Act. Monitor FY19 Homeland Security appropriations (HR 6776 and S.3109) and FY19 Omnibus Appropriations bill, HR 6147.
Monitor Maritime Administration (MARAD) National Security Multi Mission Vessels (NSMV).
